au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=6m_L2=5p5m_off
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(4700,300) # Drive guide to g6 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g6) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g5) driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(20, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(20, 0) driveBsz(257)
